MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 and EH38 postcode areas of Galashiels and Heriot. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:35am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00am on Wednesday, 20 January 2021
